languages.text: "Вы о проведенной вместе ночи? Думаю, нам не стоит придавать ей большего значения, чем она заслуживает".
"Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."
languages.original_text: "Вы о проведенной вместе ночи? Думаю, нам не стоит придавать ей большего значения, чем она заслуживает".

traits.locale_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach greater meaning to it than it's worth."
"Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach greater meaning to it than it's worth."

"Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

languages.text: 「共に過ごした、あの夜のことを言っているのですか？あのことに、必要以上の意味を持たせるべきではないと思います」
languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: 「共に過ごした、あの夜のことを言っているのですか？あのことに、必要以上の意味を持たせるべきではないと思います」

languages.text: "Sprecht Ihr von unserer gemeinsamen Nacht? Wir sollten ihr nicht mehr Bedeutung zumessen, als sie verdient hat."
languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: "Sprecht Ihr von unserer gemeinsamen Nacht? Wir sollten ihr nicht mehr Bedeutung zumessen, als sie verdient hat."

languages.text: « Vous parlez de la nuit que nous avons passée ensemble ? Mieux vaut ne pas nous appesantir sur la signification de ce moment. »
languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de la nuit que nous avons passée ensemble ? Mieux vaut ne pas nous appesantir sur la signification de ce moment. »

languages.text: «¿Se refiere a la noche que pasamos juntos? No creo que debamos atribuir ningún significado ulterior a lo que pasó».
languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se refiere a la noche que pasamos juntos? No creo que debamos atribuir ningún significado ulterior a lo que pasó».

languages.text: “你指的是我们一起度过的那一夜吗？我认为，我们不该认为那一夜有任何其他含义。”
languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: “你指的是我们一起度过的那一夜吗？我认为，我们不该认为那一夜有任何其他含义。”

languages.text: "Birlikte geçirdiğimiz o geceyi mi diyorsun? Bence o geceye gereksiz yere anlam yüklemenin lüzumu yok."
languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: "Birlikte geçirdiğimiz o geceyi mi diyorsun? Bence o geceye gereksiz yere anlam yüklemenin lüzumu yok."

languages.original_text: "Are you talking about the night we spent together? I do not think we should attach any greater meaning to it than it's worth."
